Node.Text: Hello again, sir. I'm headed to the basement.
Have you seen anything strange recently?
I have my theories... but there's nothing concrete yet. I'll let you know if I find any evidence.

I did all sorts of things, namely removing snow from the sidewalks. 'Course, it's about to snow again soon, so I guess it doesn't matter much, heh. I also saw James earlier, and he seemed mighty busy.
Did he say anything to you?
No, in fact, he just rushed right past me. Nowadays, every man has some sort of urgent business, so I didn't think much of it.
Much appreciative of the ride, sir. Take 'er easy!
